description: This file declares the prototypes for functions related to the Web Virtual Host Object in a software system. It includes function declarations for creating, removing, initializing, and managing virtual host objects, as well as resetting and engaging them.

methods.name: WebCreateVirtualHost
methods.description: Creates a virtual host object with given container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: WebVhoCreate
methods.description: Creates a Web Virtual Host object with specified contexts.

methods.name: WebVhoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Web Virtual Host object.

methods.name: WebVhoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the virtual host.

methods.name: WebVhoResetProperty
methods.description: Resets the properties of the virtual host to default values.

methods.name: WebVhoEngage
methods.description: Engages the virtual host, enabling it to operate.
